title: Ep. 203: Talking Beauty with YouTuber Kathleen Lights
itunes:title: Ep. 203: Talking Beauty with YouTuber Kathleen Lights
itunes:subtitle: YouTube star Kathleen Fuentes (aka KathleenLights) shares DIY manicure tricks and her favorite drugstore products and beauty bargains. Plus, she explains how astrology can influence your makeup routine. We’ve also got the week's beauty news (Ulta’...
description:
YouTube star Kathleen Fuentes (aka KathleenLights) shares DIY manicure tricks and her favorite drugstore products and beauty bargains. Plus, she explains how astrology can influence your makeup routine. We’ve also got the week's beauty news (Ulta’s charitable move, celebrities going gray, TikTok influencers launching beauty brands, and new science about how lips age) and help for a listener who gets “strawberry legs” after shaving. Plus, Jenn & Jess wonder: Will the famous Lipstick Index hold in our current economic uncertainty? 


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand
